Of the descent of the Paraclet a sermon preach'd before the Right Honourable the Lord Mayor and court of aldermen at the Guild-Hall chappel, April 21, 1695, being the fourth Sunday after Easter / by Philip Falle ... Falle, Philip, 1656-1742.
[8], 40 p.
Printed for John Newton ..., London : 1695.
Advertisement on p. [8]. Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York. Marginal notes.
